info.title: Visaro documentation
info.description: This is an endpoint for visaro mobile and web application

post.description: To create a new user on the system

message.example: User registered succesfully, Use Login method to receive token.

post.description: Login by email, password to get access token

message.example: User login succesfully, Use token to authenticate.

post.description: Use this endpoint to refresh the access token using the refresh token

message.example: User login succesfully, Use token to authenticate.

post.description: This endpoint will be used to validate any otp sent to a user phone

get.description: This endpoint will be used to resend

message.example: OTP has been sent to user_email@exampl.com

get.description: This return all the types of OTP request

post.summary: To send email containing password password reset code
post.description: This will be used whenever a user wants to recover a password using the forgot password interface

message.example: OTP has been sent to example@gmail.com

post.description: This will be used to create new password during password change
This will generate a transaction ID tie to the user account

get.summary: To Verify if a payment is successful
get.description: This endpoint will return the status of any payment done on visaro

post.description: This endpoint will be used to verify the BVN of the user

get.description: This will get all information about a user profile
This endpoint will return all countries

get.summary: To list all region in a country
get.description: This endpoint will return all regions in a selected country
This end point will return the account balance of the user
This endpoint is used in getting the user info before fund transfer is done e.g user_email = esekelvin24@gmail.com
This end point will return the application dashboard when the onboarding has been completed by the user

post.description: Logout User and Destroy Access Token

get.summary: This endpoint is used to get a transfer recipient account details
get.description: This endpoint is used to get a transfer recipient account details, e.g account_no =1111111103 & bank_code=000002

post.summary: To transfer fund to a Visaro User
post.description: This will enable visaro users to transfer fund to other visaro users

post.summary: To transfer fund to a beneficiary
post.description: This will enable visaro users to transfer fund to a bank account or to a visaro user
